66508.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「トーマは まだ１２:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Toma is only a 12 year old boy and yet, he plans
on taking on the Hero's duty. It's a little sad
to see...

66509.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……なげくな:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>...Lament not, Julia. That boy is a hero by nature.
I would like to keep watch over Toma, as he has
accepted his fate.

66510.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「あなたが そうおっ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>My love, if what you say is true...
Then I, too, will keep watch over that child.

66511.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「さっきね トー:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Earlier, Prince Toma and I caught each other's eye♪
He looked like he had just finished sword training
and looked so manly and handsome!

66513.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「それで トーマ: <attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>And then his little sister was following behind Toma, it was so cuuute!

66514.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「姫様がいらっし:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>When the Princess is around, it makes everyone
feel warm and fuzzy! They really are a wonderful
siblings♪

66515.「現王アリオス様は 親和と友好をもって \n 隣国 アラハギーロ王国と 同盟を結:
The current king, Arios, in the spirit of amity and friendship, has formed an alliance with the neighboring Arahaghiro Kingdom.
His peaceful personality seems to be very popular among his people. However, I wonder how he will cope with the recent increase in monsters.

66558.「我ながら ついているな。\n グランゼドーラ城に来て 早々に\n 魔物討伐の一:
I'm lucky, if I say so myself. To join Gran Zedora Castle's Monster Strike Team so soon after joining!
I've been put in charge of the castle's soldiers because of the skills I'd acquired as an adventurer. I like to show off my abilities too.

66517.「このお城の 小さなお姫様は 絵本が大好きで。\n だから 本棚の下のほうは\n:
The castle's little princess loves picture books.
That's why the lower bookshelves are full of
picture books for the Princess to look through.

66520.「近々 アリオス王様が 討伐隊を率いて\n 魔物の成敗に 向かわれるそうじゃよ。:
Soon, King Arios will lead the strike forces in punishing the monsters.
These days, the monsters seem to be increasing. And old soldiers like me were retired... Haah, it's bothersome.

66522.「その先は いまだ まどろみの中……。\n 足を踏み入れることは できません。:
Beyond here, you must enter a deeper sleep...
You cannot continue.

66523.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「さっき 我らの:
Just now, our little princess ran past with a picture book in her arms.
No doubt to have Prince Toma read it aloud for her.

66525.「………………。\n<br>\n「あなたも この世界の住人では\n ありませんね:
...You're not of this world either, are you? ...Finally, I've happened upon someone. Someone able to free that child.
This picture book is a kind of key... A key to decipher her sealed memories.

66526.「お願いします いまだ目覚めぬ\n あの子のもとへ……。:
Please, return to the child who has yet
to awaken...

66527.「………………。\n<br>\n「その絵本は ひとつのカギ……。\n 閉ざされた:
....... This picture book is a kind of key... To decipher her sealed memories.
Please, return to the child who has yet to awaken...

66532.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「コニウェア平原:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>5 attacks in Coniware Plains, 3 north and south of
Reviewle Highway... Even here, there were victims.

66533.<turn_pc>「近年 レンダーシアの各地で \n 住民が 凶悪な魔物の被害に:
In recent years, all over Lendersia, citizens harmed by fiendish monsters sieges have drastically increased.
I pray that the minstrel troupe that left my castle for Alltrades has arrived safely...

66534.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「有名な旅芸人一座が:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>The famous minstrel troupe have come to the castle.
Everyday, I've ate and drank too much.
...Hiccup.

66535.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><start_l:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><start_lip_sync n02356 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02357 _normal m00001>The troupe's dancer is so amazing!
Like a flower whirling in the wind!<stop_lip_animation n02357 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66536.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><start_l:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><start_lip_sync n02357 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02356 _normal m00001>She'll be the Gran Zedora Theatre's top dancer in
the future! I'll have to remember her name♪<stop_lip_animation n02356 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66537.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><start_l:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><start_lip_sync n02356 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02357 _normal m00001>Eeh, she said it was Janna, didn't she? Aaah!
I should've got her autograph!<stop_lip_animation n02357 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66538.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><start_l:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><start_lip_sync n02357 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02356 _normal m00001>And Princess Anlucia is good friends with her too!
Those two talking would make for a pretty picture!<stop_lip_animation n02356 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66539.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><start_l:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><start_lip_sync n02760 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02362 _normal m00001><end_attr>I was appointed by the King of Arahaghiro to
promote relations between our kingdoms, but I have
always found this kingdom to be very peaceful.<stop_lip_animation n02362 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66540.<start_lip_sync n02362 _normal m00001><s:
<start_lip_sync n02362 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02760 _normal m00001>Oh my, despite the times, King Arios' reign has
kept the peace in castletown.<stop_lip_animation n02760 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66541.<start_lip_sync n02760 _normal m00001><s:
<start_lip_sync n02760 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02362 _normal m00001>Mm-hmm. As long as Gran Zedora and Arahaghiro's
relations are strong, the increase in monsters
won't matter, don't you agree.<stop_lip_animation n02362 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66542.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><start_l:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><start_lip_sync n02362 _normal m00001><start_lip_sync n02760 _normal m00001>I agree with you. Let's keep working together to
protect the livelihood of our peoples.<stop_lip_animation n02760 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66543.「先日 王国軍に 新しい兵士長が就任しました。 \n 近年の魔物討伐で 大きな功:
The other day, the Royal Army inaugurated a new captain.
In recent years, the Monster Strike Force has achieved a lot due to Nogato, who was originally an adventurer.
He's a great man, whom the talented Gran Zedoran soldiers call the ''War Demon''. His swordsmanship is second only to Prince Toma's.

66544.「いやあ 城下町で評判の旅芸人一座が \n グランゼドーラ城に 滞在している間中:
Oh dear, the traveling troupe of minstrels staying at Gran Zedora Castle are famed for drinking, singing, and merrymaking during their stay.
It's been a while since we've had such a good time. I'm sure everyone's anxieties are gone, all thanks to the work of King Arios.

66545.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ここ オレのサ:
This is my hooky hangout. It's a secret to the other guys.
I had hoped to succeed my Grandpa Tetai as a soldier in the Royal Army, but the monsters are too strong and I'm useless.

75680.「つい先日 この玉座の間で\n 旅芸人一座の 公演があったのだ。\n なかなかの:
Just the other day, the minstrel troupe came to the throne room for a performance. It was quite the sight to see.
It was good for us soldiers to take a breather. It should get us all fired up for the future monster strikes!

66546.「お城に滞在していた 旅芸人一座の中に\n まだ あどけない踊り子さんが いたん:
Among the troupe of traveling minstrels staying at the castle is a cherubic dancer.
Since there are no kids close to her age at the castle, the Princess is extremely delighted and the two have had proper tea parties.

66547.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「闇の気配は 次:
The ominous feeling is gradually growing, and soon the lives of ordinary Lendersian people will be lost. There's not much time left.
When that fated time arrives, I hope the Hero has awakened...

66548.「こちらは 玉座の間。\n ですが アリオス王は ただいま\n 向かいの会議室に:
This is the throne room. However, King Arios
is presently in the meeting room!

66553.「……こんなにも 大きな勇者像。 \n トーマも やがて 悪しき者との戦いに身を:
...Such a grand Hero Statue.
Before long, Toma will throw himself against the evil ones; I wonder if he'll be celebrated like this.

74763.<turn_pc>「それが さだめであるならば\n せめて その身は 無事であっ:
<turn_pc>If that is fated to be, then I can't help
but pray that at least he will be safe.

70132.「………………。\n<br>\n「この花は ひとつのカギ……。\n 閉ざされた記:
.......
This flower is a kind of key...
To tear at the seams of her sealed memories.

70133.「お願いします いまだ目覚めぬ\n あの子のもとへ……。:
Please, return to the child who has yet
to awaken...

70134.「………………。\n<br>\n「その花は ひとつのカギ……。\n 閉ざされた記:
....... This flower is a kind of key... To tear at the seams of her sealed memories.
Please, return to the child who has yet to awaken...

70136.「グランゼドーラの城下町が 燃えておる。 \n こんな おそろしい光景を\n 誰:
Gran Zedora Castletown is in flames. Such a frightning scene for anyone to have witnessed, I fear...
My son introduced himself to the soldiers and took charge leading them to the front lines...
And then... Anlucia followed after her brother.
If anything happens to that boy, all hope is lost...

70137.「俺は 魔物の群れに 追われて \n 無我夢中で 城へ逃げてたんだよ。\n<br:
I got lost while escaping to the castle with a group of monsters chasing after me.
Just as they were about to catch up to me, Lord Toma appeared in a flash and brought down the monsters.
Just what one would expect of the Legendary Hero!

70138.「長く 生きてまいりましたが\n こんなに おそろしい経験はありません。\n<b:
I have lived a long time, but never have I experienced such horror.
People screaming and frantically trying to escape... A large swarm of demons covers the sky... This is the end of Gran Zedora Castle.

70139.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この先の地下に:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>The people of Gran Zedora have all been evacuated
to the underground ahead. Some of them are injured,
so please leave them be.

70140.「今ね 城下町の人たちが\n この城の地下に 避難してきてるのさ。\n<br>\:
Right now, the people of castletown are taking refuge in the castle's underground.
They must be anxious and have empty bellies... This old lady will be doing nothing but preparing lots of food to cheer them up!

70141.「うーん うーん……。\n 痛い……痛いよ……。\n<br>\n「魔元帥ゼルドラ:
Uun, uun... Ow... Ouch... Demon General Zeldrad...
That guy leading the monster's great army...

70142.「平和と栄華に彩られた 美しい城は \n まもなく なげきの色に染まる……。\n:
The peace and prosperity that adorned this beautiful castle, soon will be stained with grief...
Now all we can do is bet on the boy... Prince Toma will carry out his duty, splendidly, I hope.

70143.「この先は 玉座の間であります！ \n アリオス王も いらっしゃいます！:
This way is to the throne room!
King Arios welcomes you!

70144.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「……魔王軍が 城下:
...The Demon King's army's still approaching castletown. Every capable soldier went off to fight... But...
The Demon King's army commander... Such a terrifying guy... Ugh.

70148.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ついに……時が来て:
At last... The time has come... Toma took his sword and went off into the midst of a terrible battle...
Aaah... But Anlucia! How can you be going too... Goddess, please, protect my children.
